2025-08-21.content: You can automatically generate subtitle from your input video. For more information, see [Configure automatically generated subtitles](https://cloud.google.com/transcoder/docs/how-to/configure-auto-generated-subtitles).

summary.title: Auto-generated Subtitles
summary.summary: Automatically generate subtitles from your input video.

2025-08-21.content: You can process videos with significant number of missing frame by using the `fill_content_gaps` field. For more information, see [troubleshooting guide](https://cloud.google.com/transcoder/docs/troubleshooting#quality-issues)

summary.title: Process videos with missing frames
summary.summary: You can process videos with many missing frames using the `fill_content_gaps` field.
